scripts.theme:zip: THEME_VERSION=$(grep 'Version:' web/wordpress/wp-content/themes/wonderjarcreative-backend/style.css | awk '{print $2}') && npm run composer:install --no-audit && cd web/wordpress/wp-content/themes && zip -r wonderjarcreative-backend-$THEME_VERSION.zip wonderjarcreative-backend -x '*.git*' -x '*node_modules*' -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*composer.json' -x '*composer.lock'
scripts.theme:zip:prod: THEME_VERSION=$(grep 'Version:' web/wordpress/wp-content/themes/wonderjarcreative-backend/style.css | awk '{print $2}') && cd web/wordpress/wp-content/themes/wonderjarcreative-backend && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && cd .. && zip -r wonderjarcreative-backend-$THEME_VERSION.zip wonderjarcreative-backend -x '*.git*' -x '*node_modules*' -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*composer.json' -x '*composer.lock' && echo "Theme zipped to web/wordpress/wp-content/themes/wonderjarcreative-backend-$THEME_VERSION.zip"
